room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Montgomery in Montgomery
review: It's a beautiful setting with a friendly staff. My group played the Antidote game and we had a blast! There was one surprise after another. I can't wait to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Montgomery in Montgomery
review: Had so much fun in Antidote. The game master was awesome! From my 10-year-old to us adults was worth the cost. Lots of fun can't wait to come back!
